task.title: fix(slopes): allow /status and /tasks during active agent
task.description:
Problem: Telegram commands like /status and /tasks fail to return when an agent is working.

Scope:
- Investigate command routing in telegram-bot.mjs and codex-shell.
- Ensure /status and /tasks are handled without being blocked by active Codex turn.
- Add non-blocking execution path or separate handler queue for fast commands.

Acceptance Criteria:
- /status and /tasks respond reliably even when Codex is busy.
- No interference with active agent run.
